statements: SELECT * FROM ar_campaign_data WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, total_budget FROM ar_campaign_data WHERE total_clicks > 100;
SELECT campaign_name, total_clicks, total_conversions FROM ar_campaign_data WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ar_campaign_data WHERE total_budget < 5000 ORDER BY total_budget DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, total_clicks FROM ar_campaign_data WHERE total_conversions > 20 ORDER BY total_clicks DESC, campaign_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ar_campaign_data WHERE total_clicks > 100 ORDER BY total_clicks DESC, campaign_name ASC
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, total_budget FROM ar_campaign_data WHERE total_budget BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY end_date ASC
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, total_clicks, total_conversions FROM ar_campaign_data WHERE total_clicks < 50 AND total_conversions >= 10 ORDER BY start_date DESC, total_clicks ASC
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, total_budget FROM ar_campaign_data WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY total_budget DESC
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, total_clicks, total_conversions FROM ar_campaign_data WHERE total_clicks > total_conversions AND total_budget > 10000 ORDER BY campaign_id ASC
SELECT * FROM historical_campaign_data;
SELECT campaign_name, total_budget FROM historical_campaign_data ORDER BY total_budget DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, start_date, end_date FROM historical_campaign_data WHERE total_clicks > 1000;
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience, channel FROM marketing_strategies WHERE cost_per_conversion < 50.00;
SELECT campaign_name, total_clicks, total_conversions FROM historical_campaign_data WHERE total_clicks >= 500 AND total_conversions >= 50 ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_campaign_data ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, total_budget, total_clicks FROM historical_campaign_data WHERE total_clicks > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, total_budget, start_date, end_date FROM historical_campaign_data WHERE total_budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(total_clicks), SUM(total_conversions) FROM historical_campaign_data WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';

SELECT campaign_name, total_clicks, channel, cost_per_conversion FROM historical_campaign_data JOIN marketing_strategies ON historical_campaign_data.campaign_id = marketing_strategies.strategy_id WHERE channel = 'Social Media';
SELECT * FROM ar_campaign_data;
SELECT campaign_name, total_revenue FROM ar_campaign_data WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM audience_segment ORDER BY segment_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, engagement_score, engagement_date FROM customer_engagement WHERE campaign_id = 3 ORDER BY engagement_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, total_revenue, end_date FROM ar_campaign_data WHERE total_revenue > 500 ORDER BY campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_name, total_revenue FROM ar_campaign_data;
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement WHERE engagement_score > 8;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM audience_segment ORDER BY segment_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, total_revenue, start_date, end_date FROM ar_campaign_data WHERE total_revenue > 5000;
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement JOIN ar_campaign_data ON customer_engagement.campaign_id = ar_campaign_data.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM ar_campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ar_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1
SELECT SUM(budget) FROM ar_campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM ar_campaigns JOIN campaign_metrics ON ar_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_metrics.campaign_id
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT * FROM ar_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM ar_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, SUM(impressions), SUM(clicks) FROM ar_campaigns JOIN campaign_metrics ON ar_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_metrics.campaign_id GROUP BY ar_campaigns.campaign_name;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE interests LIKE '%technology%';
SELECT campaign_name, rating, comments FROM ar_campaigns JOIN campaign_feedback ON ar_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_feedback.campaign_id WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM AR_Campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM AR_Campaigns
SELECT budget, platform FROM AR_Campaigns WHERE budget > 500
SELECT * FROM Campaign_Results WHERE conversion_rate > 3.5
SELECT result_id, revenue FROM Campaign_Results ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM AR_Campaigns
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget, platform FROM AR_Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000
SELECT campaign_id, AVG(conversion_rate) AS avg_conversion_rate FROM Campaign_Results GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING AVG(conversion_rate) > 3.5
SELECT DISTINCT audience_id, demographic, age_group FROM Campaign_Audience WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY age_group DESC
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM Campaign_Expenses GROUP BY campaign_id ORDER BY total_expenses DESC
